about_the_game: Zombies returns in all of its undead glory with "The Giant," a research facility featuring the weapon-upgrading Pack-a-Punch Machine.   Re-live the chaos of Treyarch’s classic "Der Riese" Zombies map, picking up the Zombies story with Dempsey, Nikolai, Richtofen, and Takeo where Origins left off.
detailed_description: Zombies returns in all of its undead glory with "The Giant," a research facility featuring the weapon-upgrading Pack-a-Punch Machine.   Re-live the chaos of Treyarch’s classic "Der Riese" Zombies map, picking up the Zombies story with Dempsey, Nikolai, Richtofen, and Takeo where Origins left off.

fullgame.name: Call of Duty®: Black Ops III

legal_notice: © 2015 Activision Publishing, Inc. ACTIVISION, CALL OF DUTY, CALL OF DUTY BLACK OPS, and stylized roman numeral III are trademarks of Activision Publishing, Inc.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13.6 (High Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 (4 Cores) @ 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI® Radeon™ M295X @ 2GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: NVIDIA and Intel GPUs are not officially supported hardware.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit / Windows 8 64-Bit / Windows 8.1 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-530 @ 2.93 GHz / AMD Phenom™ II X4 810 @ 2.60 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 470 @ 1GB / ATI® Radeon™ HD 6970 @ 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
